translations: 对……作民意调查；（候选人）获得票数；投票；轮询；截掉（动物，尤指小牛）的角；截去（树或植物）的梢（poll 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.sentence: They polled 39% of the vote in the last election.
sentences.translation: 在上届选举中，他们获得了39%的选票。

sentences.sentence: Over 50% of those polled were against the proposed military action.
sentences.translation: 民调中有超过50%的人反对拟议的军事行动。
